mapper.sql: id, code, `name`, major, grade, sex, birthday, tel, job
mapper.select: select * from t_user where uname=#{uname} and upwd=#{upwd}
mapper.insert: insert into t_student (id, code, `name`, major, grade, sex, birthday, tel, job) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{tel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{job,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update t_student
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
